titleInfo.title: Comparative Proteomics of Chloroplast Envelopes from C-3 and C-4 Plants Reveals Specific Adaptations of the Plastid Envelope to C-4 Photosynthesis and Candidate Proteins Required for Maintaining C-4 Metabolite Fluxes (vol 148, pg 568, 2008)
